dict.string:
. "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/html.sh" . "${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/lib/misc.sh"
cat <<CSS <link href='file://$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/css/default.css' type='text/css'> <style>table { font-size: 9pt; } td { text-align: right; }</style> CSS
htmlHeader "Schema Browser" tableBrowser.py --server=$(database_choice)
